column5: Timing of NASA’s moon launch may depend on emergency detonation system
column6: The system, which is designed to destroy the SLS rocket if it veers off course and threatens population centers, needs to be recharged every few weeks.

column5: Judge will let Elon Musk add whistleblower claims to case against Twitter
column6: A judge ruled that Elon Musk could not delay the Twitter trial over whistleblower allegations, but could amend his counterclaims.

column5: ‘Splatoon 3’ adds a fresh coat of paint to a proven formula
column6: Fans of the series will find a lot of familiarity and a formula already proven to work.

column5: You met him as ‘Corn Kid.’ Now, he’s South Dakota’s ‘corn-bassador.’
column6: Tariq's ode to corn took social media by storm and inspired a viral song. Now, "Corn Boy" has become South Dakota's first "Corn-bassador."

column5: Apple set to reveal iPhone 14, new Apple Watch at ‘Far Out’ event
column6: According to some industry observers, the company’s line-up of new smartphones could look notably different this year.
